TopicTitle: update a craft in steam workshop

Articles.Content:
hi there..

i know this is not exactly an ingame question but..

i've uploaded a craft on steam workshop, now, after flying it a few times i made some correction and wanted to make a 1.1 version of the very same craft, using the verysame workshop page, so that people who subscribed get the update..

 

but i cannot figure out how to do it, as i cannot find an update/change feature..

 

is there actually a way to do it?
If you upload it with the same name, it should overwrite.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/ppn1wwijyiwqcww/KOEING.JPG?dl=0

not sure this works :|

but i just noticed that renamed craft do not work..

so i had a Koeing 888-100 that i renamed Koeing 888 and it uploaded a new one..

 

but if now i reupload the same craft it works..
